reference.notes:
Elements References -------- ---------- B C N O F Ne Al Si P S Cl Ar: J.G. Hill, S. Mazumder, and K.A. Peterson, Correlation consistent basis sets for molecular core-valence effects with explicitly correlated wave functions: the atoms B-Ne and Al-Ar, Journal of Chemical Physics 132, 054108 (2010).
Li Be Na Mg: J. Grant Hill and Kirk A. Peterson, Correlation consistent basis sets for explicitly correlated wavefunctions: valence and core-valence basis sets for Li, Be, Na, and Mg, Physical Chemistry Chemical Physics 12, 10460 (2010).
